description: Soleil is an idol group created by http://anidb.net/ch48466 [Mitsuishi Orihime] to rival http://anidb.net/ch77471 [Tristar]. It original consisted of http://anidb.net/ch47564 [Hoshimiya Ichigo] and http://anidb.net/ch47567 [Kiriya Aoi]. However, http://anidb.net/ch47566 [Shibuki Ran] joined right before their first concert.
name: Soleil
